description:
An incredible new video is making its rounds on the Internet that asks a group of children, ages 5-13, their opinions about same-sex marriage.一段不可思议的新视频在网上广为流传。在这段视频里，一群5至13岁的孩子们被询问他们对同性婚姻的看法。

The video starts with the kids watching two different viral videos of gay marriage proposals and then a brief Q&A about their opinions surrounding marriage equality ensues.在这段视频中，孩子们首先观看了两段关于同性情侣求婚场景的网络视频，随后是一个围绕婚姻平等问题展开的提问环节。

The reactions of these children are both heartwarming and hopeful, suggesting that rights for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) people could very well be close to a non-issue for the next generation. As one participant eloquently puts it, "If one person should be able to do something then everybody else should be able to do it."孩子们对这段视频的反应让人感到内心温暖，充满希望。预示着在下一代人中，男同性恋、女同性恋、双性恋以及变性人的权益问题很可能会得到解决。正如一个参加拍摄的孩子以雄辩的语气所说的，“如果有人有权利做某件事，那么所有其他的人都应有权利做同样的事。”
